EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> <http://vmturbo.com/resources/vmturbo-quick-start-guide?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=30day_deploy>
Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Thank you for downloading VMTurbo Operations Manager – the world’s only unified demand-driven control platform. Setup takes just 15 minutes – literally 15 minutes – and you’ll begin receiving specific performance and efficiency-maximizing actions to take within the first hour. Watch this 3-minute setup video <http://vmturbo.com/resources/vmturbo-quick-start-guide?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=30day_deploy>, or follow the instructions below, to get started.
- Deploy VMTurbo through your hypervisor console
- Configure the IP address & time zone
- DHCP: automatically configures - Static IP username/password: ipsetup/ipsetup
- Setting time username/password: root/vmturbo
- Enter command yast timezone
- Web appliance login username/password: administrator/administrator
- Apply a license key (delivered in a separate email) & add hypervisor targets
Once you've added targets, VMTurbo will discover your entire environment and begin offering specific actions which you can execute via single-click API call. Ever wonder just how awesome your infrastructure could perform? How efficiently it could run? You're almost there.
